attributes.action: make a public apology for all the unnecessary public apologies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand a public apology from Gordon Brown. All that's happened since he took over the number one job is apologise for things other people have done which don't warrant a public apology.

Now is the time to stand up and be a leader. Stop pandering to these whiney morons, tell them where to stick it and get on with leading the country.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
